name: pay-day
caption: Pay Day

effect.short: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user's level.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user's level in extra money for each time this move was used.

flavorText:
Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict
damage. Money is earned after the battle.
